comments: v-pile positions of the 4-Wythoff game, i=3 (Connell).
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Ian G. Connell, A generalization of Wythoff's game, Canad. Math. Bull. 2 (1959) 181-190
formula: a(n) = floor( (n+3/4)*(3+sqrt 5) ) . - R. J. Mathar, Feb 14 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
